name: gorandp-website-monorepo
description: Full-stack monorepo for React + FastAPI on Cloudflare

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run pywrangler dev
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && uv run pywrangler deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
